item.ptxt: Confirm the sheet thickness, tensile strength, and existence of the zinc treatment of both sides, and set the welder to conform to the welding conditions by referring to Front Body Construction.
Welding symbols (The welding symbols with dashed lines have a meaning of the spot welding of the part which is not visible)

s1.ptxt: Clamp the new bulkhead parts. Measure the front compartment diagonally.

ptxt.sie-ref04: Engine compartment and front floor, under view

s1.ptxt: Temporarily install the front fender, the hood, and the door(s), then check for differences in level and clearance. Check the external parts fitting positions. If necessary, check the front bumper beam, the front bumper, and the headlight positions. Make sure the body lines flow smoothly.

item.ptxt: Weld the bumper beam extension (A) and the bumper beam extension bracket (B).
Fasten the bulkhead upper frame (C) by tightening the mounting bolts.

s1.ptxt: Weld the bulkhead side stay (A) and the bulkhead support (B).
Weld the bulkhead side stay (A) and the bulkhead lower crossmember (B).
